thread.title: BRIEF-‍Moody's Says New Zealand's Credit Profile Reflects High Economic Resilience & Strong Fiscal Metrics​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-‍Moody's Says New Zealand's Credit Profile Reflects High Economic Resilience & Strong Fiscal Metrics​

organizations.name: credit profile reflects high economic resilience & strong fiscal metrics

text:
April 6 (Reuters) - Moody’s:
* ‍MOODY’S SAYS NEW ZEALAND’S CREDIT PROFILE REFLECTS HIGH ECONOMIC RESILIENCE & STRONG FISCAL METRICS; VULNERABILITIES MITIGATED BY EFFECTIVE INSTITUTIONS​
* GLOBAL DEMAND FOR NEW ZEALAND’S AGRICULTURE, TOURISM-RELATED PRODUCTS WILL STAY ROBUST
* NEW ZEALAND’S ECONOMIC PROFILE SUPPORTS ELECTED COALITION GOVT’S CREDIT POSITIVE COMMITMENT TO PRESERVE FISCAL SURPLUSES, REDUCE GOVERNMENT DEBT OVER NEXT 5 YRS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: [ ]
